message: فيه جامعة/اكاديمية/اياً كان اسمها فيها Web Development في مصر؟ :D

data.message: أي حد بيدرس حاسبات و معلومات غالبا بيعلموهم (أو بيخلوهم يتعلموا بأنهم يدوهم assignment أو مشروع).
لأ انا قصدي حاجة متخصصة في الـWeb بس.
I think the closest might be the ITI then.

In the GUC we have a "Web Technologies" course in the DMET major, but the content was almost completely obsolete as far as I remember.
There is also the "Software Engineering" course in the CSEN major where there is usually a very big Web Development project that spans the whole semester and the whole tutorial group works together (about 20 people) and they learn how to apply SCRUM along the way, this one actually teaches you how to learn :)

Edit: You mean a Web Dev major? I don't think that this exists anywhere, so the closest would be ITI as Mohamed Meligy suggested.
